gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Mavericks 144, Spurs 119
gameRecap.excerpt: Luka Doncic records his sixth triple-double of the season as the Mavericks defeat the Spurs, 144-119. Doncic notched 39 points, 12 rebounds and 10 assists, while Tim Hardaway Jr. added 23 points and 5 3PM for the Mavericks in the victory. Jeremy Sochan tallied a team-high 23 points and 9 rebounds for the Spurs in the losing effort. The Mavericks snap a 3-game losing streak as they improve to 17-12 on the season, while the Spurs fall to 4-24.
